law.catch_line: Activity not deemed restraint of trade.
law.text: No association meeting or activity undertaken to carry out the provisions of KRS 247.6901 to 247.6957 and intended to benefit all of the producers, handlers, dealers, and processors of ovine or caprine animals shall be deemed or considered illegal or in restraint of trade.
law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 8, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 347, sec. 3, effective July 14, 1992.
